name: Kalewave
description:
Gameplay

Take control of Vainamoinen and navigate to the exit flag to get to the next level while jamming out to some sweet tunes. Collect colour combinations to pass through doors blocking the way.

Controls ActionKeyboardGamepadMove leftALeft Joystick leftMove rightDLeft Joystick rightJumpSpace barSony Cross/XBox A/Nintendo B/Bottom actionMenuEscapeSony Select/XBox back/Nintendo -/Back Hints
  • When using keyboard use left hand fingers to move and right hand finger(s) to jump. It's much easier to make some tough jumps.
  • You cannot perish and failing jumps will only require you to repeat certain parts of level. Getting stuck shouldn't be possible.
